scripts._dev: npm run open && if exist %cd%/node_modules ( npm run dev ) else ( yarn run dev )
scripts._build: if exist %cd%/node_modules ( npm run build ) else ( yarn run build )
scripts._start: npm run open && if exist %cd%/node_modules ( npm start ) else ( yarn start )
scripts._export: if exist %cd%/node_modules ( npm run export ) else ( yarn run export )
scripts.setYarn2: npm install -g yarn && yarn set version berry && yarn install && yarn add react-is && yarn add @yarnpkg/sdks -D && yarn dlx @yarnpkg/sdks vscode
